      • setDebugging

        public static void setDebugging(boolean flag)
        Enable/disable debugging.

        Before enabling, setDebugger(DebuggerRunner) must be called with a non-null debugger.

        Parameters:
        flag - true to enable debugging, false to disabled

        Parameters:
